content:
Howdy!
I am currently a Master's student with Sidd Srinivasa in the Personal Robotics Lab. I also work with Emo Todorov and his students in the Movement Control Laboratory. I am primarily interested in developing algorithms that enable intelligent machines to acquire general notions of intelligence in order to robustly solve complex and temporally-extended tasks in real-world settings. I've previously interned at NASA JPL Robotics, NASA Glenn Research Center, and Blue Origin.
For more information, feel free to drop by my website.

title: Colin X Summers
